sadly there will come a time in each of your careers when youll have a chance to screw over another soap opera actor. i had such an opportunity in the recent, present. and im ashamed to say that i took it, i advised a fellow actor to play a role, homosexually. yeah, we both auditioned for the part, and uh, as it turned out, they ah, they liked the stupid gay thing and cast him. and now, hes got a two year contract opposite susan luchhi, the first lady of daytime television, and me, me im stuck here teaching a bunch of people, most of whom are too ugly to even be on tv. im sorry, im sorry, im sorry. he gets a huge round of applause from his students. thank you.
